name: MAGIC ITEM (2): BAKELITE MIRROR
description:
Inspired artisans of the 'U.S.A,' made this vanity mirror
a century ago from "bakelite", a semi-magical
synthetic material that was in vogue before
industrial plastics.

It was likely used to check make-up and hair at a vanity table before going out to a nightclub or society dinner. Even today 'bakelite' is sought after as rare signifier of 20th Century material culture pre-WW2.

This digital "token" confers upon you
a portion of the aesthetic and para-natural
power of this radiant meta-object.

Think on the maker of this physical item
and send them your gratitude
through the centuries - for the
privilege of holding it's
meta-verse avatar.

I took this photo and was blessed
by this object and the sincere
expression of it's maker.

I truly hope my photo gives a portion
of that warmth and comfort to you.

HPL
